known_characteristics: Powerful and easy to learn spells, though could easily be committed to another
Learned most varied magic, hard to be chosen
Consistent magic, bonded strongly to fist user
Easily obtainable, frequently used in the past
Powerful, but difficult to master, particularly prized by Transfigurers. Could sense danger and cast curses on their one.

used_by: Johannes Jonker, Isolt Sayre, James Steward

known_characteristics: Produced spells of force and elegance
Rumored to have had an affinity for dark magic, although suitable for use by non-dark wizards and witches as well,
Exceptionally powerful and sensitive to Parseltongue. Could warn its owner of danger by emitting a low musical tone
Unknown, presumably had an affinity for the Dark Arts
Unstable, had an affinity for powerful yet unpredictable wizards
